/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. On either side of the street, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment. Buildings rise in the distance, their facades hinting at the architectural style of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the street.
